page.title: 08HOW TO SKIP
page.content: First of all find a long rope. Get two people to stand one at each end of the rope. Turn the rope in a circular fashion making the rope touch the ground each time you turn it. A third person runs in when the rope is in the air and waits till the rope comes near the feet then jumps across the rope. Keep doing this. Now you have learned to skip. { {UNDERS AND OVERS} When the rope is in the air run under it straight to the other side. When you have done this you go over the rope, straight to the other side. Next you go under the rope and skip once then over an skip twice. Carry on doing this until someone is out. Then you start again.
